p: The Chao index was calculated at the genera level with Vegan R packages in R software (version 3.2.4). PCA was analyzed using the FactoMine R package in R software (version 3.2.4). Differential abundance of genes, phylum, genus, species, and KO modules was tested using the Studentâ€™s t-test, and P values were corrected for multiple testing using the Benjamin & Hochberg method.
